* **Sales record:** All 6 previous buyers who purchased the product received a high-quality item. This suggests a very high probability of the current product also being high quality.

Given the potential payoff of $12,000 for a high-quality product and the risk of only losing $10,000 for a low-quality product, the odds heavily favor buying.
